{{also|Leben|lében}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|goh|lebēn}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*libjaną}}, from {{der|de|ine-pro|*leyp-||leave, cling, linger}}. Cognate with {{cog|osx|libbian}} ({{cog|gml|leven}}, {{cog|nds-de|lęven}}, {{m|nds-de|lewen||to live}}), {{cog|nl|leven}}, {{cog|en|live}}, {{cog|fy|libje}}, {{cog|non|lifa}} ({{cog|sv|leva}}), {{cog|got|𐌻𐌹𐌱𐌰𐌽}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈleːbən/|[ˈleːm̩]|[ˈleːb(ə)n]}} * {{audio|de|De-leben.ogg|audio}} * {{audio|de|De-at-Leben.ogg|audio (Austria)}} ===Verb=== {{de-verb-weak|lebt|lebte|gelebt}} # {{lb|de|intransitive}} to [[live]], to be [[alive]] # {{lb|de|intransitive}} to [[dwell]], to [[reside]] #* '''2010''', ''{{w|Der Spiegel}}'', issue [http://www.spiegel.de/spiegel/print/index-2010-35.html 35/2010], page 102: #*: Es '''leben''' etwa 300 000 Bürger des ehemaligen Jugoslawien in der Schweiz, kaum ein Staat hat damals im Verhältnis zu seiner Einwohnerzahl so viele Flüchtlinge aufgenommen. #*:: There '''are''' (=reside) about 300,000 citizens of the former Yugoslavia living in Switzerland, hardly any state took in so many refugees in relation to its population at that time. #: ''Ich '''lebe''' in der Schillerstraße in der Nähe des Stadtzentrums.'' - I '''live''' in the Schiller-street near the city's center. # {{lb|de|intransitive}} to [[live]], to [[exist]], to occupy a place #: ''Die Dinosaurier '''lebten''' für Jahrmillionen auf der Erde bevor der Mensch erschien.'' - The dinosaurs '''existed''' on Earth for millions of years prior to the rise of man. # {{lb|de|intransitive|hyperbole}} To [[cope]] with, to [[live]] with, to [[deal]] with. #: ''Du wirst wohl damit '''leben''' müssen!'' - You'll have to '''cope with''' it! #: ''Jeder muss mit seinen eigenen Problemen '''leben'''!'' - Everybody has to '''deal''' with his own issues. ====Conjugation==== {{de-conj-weak|leb|gelebt|h}} ====Derived terms==== {{top2}} * {{l|de|ableben}} * {{l|de|aufleben}} * {{l|de|auf großem Fuß leben}} * {{l|de|ausleben}} * {{l|de|beleben}} * {{l|de|durchleben}} {{mid2}} * {{l|de|einleben}} * {{l|de|erleben}} * {{l|de|Lebewohl}} * {{l|de|überleben}} * {{l|de|verleben}} * {{l|de|weiterleben}} * {{l|de|zusammenleben}} {{bottom}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|bleiben}} * {{l|de|Leben}} * {{l|de|lebendig}} * {{l|de|Leib}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} ---- ==Nubi== ===Etymology=== From {{der|kcn|ar|لَبَن}}. ===Noun=== {{head|kcn|noun|head=lében}} # [[milk]] {{topics|kcn|Beverages}} ---- ==Old High German== ===Etymology 1=== From {{inh|goh|gem-pro|*libjaną}}, related to {{cog|ang|libban}}, {{cog|non|lifa}}. Ultimately from {{der|goh|ine-pro|*leyp-|t=leave, cling, linger}}. ====Verb==== {{goh-verb|head=lebēn}} # to [[live]] =====Conjugation===== {{goh-conj-wk3|leb}} =====Descendants===== * {{desc|gmh|leben}} ** {{desc|gsw|lëëbe}} *** Alsatian: {{l|gsw|lawe}} *** {{desc|swg|läba}} ** {{desc|de|leben}} ** {{desc|lb|liewen}} ** {{desc|wym|łaowa}} ** {{desc|yi|לעבן}} ===Etymology 2=== Derived from the verb {{m|goh|lebēn}}. ====Noun==== {{goh-noun|head=lebēn|n}} # [[life]] =====Descendants===== * {{desc|gmh|leben}} ** {{desc|gsw|Läbe}} ** {{desc|de|Leben}} ** {{desc|yi|לעבן}}
